## Description {#details}

This file provides a collection of visitors which walk the (instruction) uses of a pointer.

These visitors all provide the same essential behavior as an InstVisitor with similar template-based flexibility and implementation strategies.

These can be used, for example, to quickly analyze the uses of an alloca, global variable, or function argument.

FIXME: Provide a variant which doesn&#39;t track offsets and is cheaper.

<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A base class for visitors over the uses of a pointer value.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Once constructed, a user can call \\c visit on a pointer value, and this</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="comment">/// will walk its uses and visit each instruction using an InstVisitor. It also</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="comment">/// provides visit methods which will recurse through any pointer-to-pointer</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="comment">/// transformations such as GEPs and bitcasts.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="comment">/// During the visit, the current Use&#42; being visited is available to the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="comment">/// subclass, as well as the current offset from the original base pointer if</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="comment">/// known.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The recursive visit of uses is accomplished with a worklist, so the only</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ordering guarantee is that an instruction is visited before any uses of it</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="comment">/// are visited. Note that this does &#42;not&#42; mean before any of its users are</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="comment">/// visited! This is because users can be visited multiple times due to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="comment">/// multiple, different uses of pointers derived from the same base.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A particular Use will only be visited once, but a User may be visited</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="comment">/// multiple times, once per Use. This visits may notably have different</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="comment">/// offsets.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="comment">/// All visit methods on the underlying InstVisitor return a boolean. This</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="comment">/// return short-circuits the visit, stopping it immediately.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="comment">/// FIXME: Generalize this for all values rather than just instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DerivedT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ptrusevisitor"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ptrusevisitor/#a564995c967b0a398c32f31a41b4418c1">PtrUseVisitor</a> : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">protected</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instvisitor">InstVisitor</a>&lt;DerivedT&gt;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal">                      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/ptrusevisitorbase">detail::PtrUseVisitorBase</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">friend</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instvisitor">InstVisitor</a>&lt;DerivedT&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">Base = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instvisitor">InstVisitor&lt;DerivedT&gt;</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ptrusevisitor/#a564995c967b0a398c32f31a41b4418c1"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ptrusevisitor/#a564995c967b0a398c32f31a41b4418c1">PtrUseVisitor</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/ptrusevisitorbase/#ac5b2513c27d0e8fe9a9214eb9fe99a7b">DL</a>) : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/ptrusevisitorbase/#a17dd1253e0ec2090980e7544fea1bd83">PtrUseVisitorBase</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/ptrusevisitorbase/#ac5b2513c27d0e8fe9a9214eb9fe99a7b">DL</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;assert</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(std::is&#95;base&#95;of&lt;PtrUseVisitor, DerivedT&gt;::value,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="normal">                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Must pass the derived type to this template!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Recursively visit the uses of the given pointer.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\returns An info struct about the pointer. See \\c PtrInfo for details.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// We may also need to process Argument pointers, so the input uses is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// a common Value type.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
